main event: Two P-FE fighter pilots reported observing an unidentified object that appeared similar to a box kite while flying over the area 100 miles east of Honshu, Japan.
interesting points: The object was first detected by ground radar before the pilots were vectored to its location., The object was described as having the approximate dimensions of 30 inches by 24 inches., The object appeared to remain stationary during the observation period., No visible means of support for the object was observed by the pilots., The sighting took place over a total observation duration of 12 minutes visually.
sighted object: an unidentified object resembling a box kite
